head.title: Metro Business; Bank Takeover Bid Ending

hedline.hl1: Metro Business; Bank Takeover Bid Ending

abstract.p: North Fork Bancorp announces that it will not extend its exchange offer for Dime Bancorp stock, which is scheduled to expire today; expiration effectively ends North Fork's seven-month-long hostile bid for Dime (S)

block.p: North Fork Bancorporation announced yesterday that it would not extend its exchange offer for Dime Bancorp stock, which is scheduled to expire today. The expiration effectively ends North Fork's seven-month-long hostile bid for Dime, a New York savings and loan.

North Fork Bancorporation announced yesterday that it would not extend its exchange offer for Dime Bancorp stock, which is scheduled to expire today. The expiration effectively ends North Fork's seven-month-long hostile bid for Dime, a New York savings and loan.
But the battle for Dime is not over: North Fork hopes to replace a majority of Dime's board next year.
